Job Posting:172040 - Position: F25 Cybersecurity Co-op 172040 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 08/25/2025 09:00 AM Through UBC Science Co-op 08/20/2025 03:25 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country TELUS Communications Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Cybersecurity Co-op 172040 Co-op Position Vancouver, BC Canada 4 or 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List $23 - $28 Hourly Kick-start your career with TELUS' Engineering, Technology and Business Co-op Are you curious about state-of-the-art technology? Passionate about starting your career in an environment that fosters innovation and enables you to make a real difference? Join our Engineering, Technology and Business Co-op to gain hands-on experience alongside industry leading mentors. Our Co- op is designed to expand your technical toolbox, grow your professional network,and bring your unique ideas to life. You will have an opportunity to build your brand within the organization and lay a foundation for your future career with us. Cybersecurity Solutions • Develop pioneering cybersecurity and privacy solutions to protect Canadians from the full spectrum of online threats • Build skills in cybersecurity and threat assessment, software DevOps and security product development • 5G and Wireless Networks • Advance Canada's largest and fastest wireless network as we evolve to a hyper-connected 5G world • Work on macro sites, in-building networks and Wi-Fi; and learn about wireless IP access design, wireless core network design, data analytics, virtualization and DevOps. Job Requirements What you will bring Required education and experience: • You are currently enrolled in your 3rd+ year of an accredited Engineering, Computer Science or Business University program. • Minimum of one term or summer internship completed Required skills and abilities: • Curious and passionate about learning new technologies • Have a deep commitment to making a difference for our customers • Demonstrate leadership in the way you approach your work, as shown through your academic, volunteer/community and extracurricular activities • Possess excellent interpersonal and communication skills • Have demonstrated the ability to work in a team environmen • Are self-motivated and have a strong sense of personal initiative and ownership • Are creative and innovative in your thinking • Have strong analytical and problem-solving skills • Can see "the big picture" while also being detail oriented Thrive in a high-performing, fast-paced, large and sometimes ambiguous environment • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through UBC Science Co-op Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions
